peopleAlsoAsk.question: How to value old Chinese coins?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet:
Types of Old Chinese Coins Their value varies greatly based on their age, rarity, and condition. Early examples from the Warring States period or rare mints from the Song Dynasty can fetch high prices. Silver Coins: The late Qing Dynasty and the Republic of China period (1912-1949) saw the production of silver coins.
Jul 29, 2024

peopleAlsoAsk.question: Are older silver coins worth anything?
peopleAlsoAsk.snippet: Yes, 90% silver coins, also known as "junk silver," can be a valuable investment. These coins, including pre-1965 U.S. dimes, quarters, and half dollars, are worth their silver content and can appreciate in value due to their historical significance and rarity.
